alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 25 at 3:18AM PST until November 25 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, Southern Salinas Valley and Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Cuyama Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Southern Salinas Valley
